content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"This module provides helpful new hire information.  Access is provided prior to your start date for your convenience, but review is voluntary, and all content will remain available after you begin your employment. \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We believe that EPAM’s biggest asset is its people. People who learn new skills, discover fresh opportunities and find innovative solutions to problems. Isn’t this why EPAM is one of the world’s technology leaders and trendsetters?\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Continuous learning is a non-stop process of acquiring knowledge and expanding skillsets. It’s the only approach to remaining a high-level professional in the fast, modern world. That’s why leading multinational companies do their best to support employees in continuous learning. EPAM has even built an entire infrastructure for this purpose.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":5664,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/cf339ebc-67d1-49d5-b543-56e6e13e3d2b/learn.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/cf339ebc-67d1-49d5-b543-56e6e13e3d2b/learn.PNG?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"learn.PNG\",\"name\":\"learn.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"cf339ebc-67d1-49d5-b543-56e6e13e3d2b\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":580,\"height\":49},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"LEARN \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"is a catalog of educational products and services aimed to support continuous professional development of employees and manage learning more effectively.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Here you can find courses and programs on various professional topics: software development and testing, business intelligence, architecture, English, business analysis, interpersonal communication, leadership, etc. LinkedIn Learning courses are also integrated into our training catalog and available for all EPAMers. Besides LinkedIn Learning, you can read with getAbstract library of summarized business literature and apply for access to O’Reilly, a multifunctional learning platform. Try it now and fit learning into your busy schedule anytime, anywhere!\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"rgb(70, 69, 71)\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":54470,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/19d624b6-d2ac-4cc6-87d4-411b9dab7d57/learn2.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/19d624b6-d2ac-4cc6-87d4-411b9dab7d57/learn2.PNG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"learn2.PNG\",\"name\":\"learn2.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"19d624b6-d2ac-4cc6-87d4-411b9dab7d57\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":786,\"height\":354},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"separatorBLock\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":9796,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/48fdb05a-b680-49f9-8500-d0fb6c2e0ad9/lu.JPG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/48fdb05a-b680-49f9-8500-d0fb6c2e0ad9/lu.JPG?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"lu.JPG\",\"name\":\"lu.JPG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"jpeg\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"48fdb05a-b680-49f9-8500-d0fb6c2e0ad9\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":239,\"height\":76},\"extension\":\"JPG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Looking for a place where you can find unified information about your career at EPAM? Check LEVEL UP - your personal guide to navigate professional growth - from choosing the right career target to defining and developing required skills.\\r\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Go to the LEVEL UP portal (will be available after your start date), explore recommended career options, build a path to the desired target, choose it - and start working on the skills you need to achieve your goal.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"iframe\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"//videoportal.epam.com/video/iframe.html?video=qoklvwRA\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#9BC837\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Online Library - getAbstract\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#9BC837\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"getAbstract is the world’s largest online library of summarized content, consisting of over 20,000 summaries. getAbstract offers the best business books and articles, video talks, and economic reports, which were thoroughly rated, read and summarized into 10-minute abstracts. All of them are available at your fingertips anytime, anywhere on any device in 2 formats: text and audio. \\r All EPAM employees have unlimited access to the service till January 2021. You can use already compressed knowledge to make better decisions in business and in your private life.\\r\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"rgb(70, 69, 71)\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"separatorBLock\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":5583,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/14adab4c-b7a5-4807-a01e-5f83c324432b/grow.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/14adab4c-b7a5-4807-a01e-5f83c324432b/grow.PNG?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"grow.PNG\",\"name\":\"grow.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"14adab4c-b7a5-4807-a01e-5f83c324432b\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":557,\"height\":73},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"What will be your next career goal?\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"What will be your next career goal?\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We made \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"GROW \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"to help you achieve excellent results and plan your professional and career growth.  It is a platform for self-education and mentorship full of a powerful collection of tools built to reach IT career goals.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"iframe\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"//videoportal.epam.com/video/iframe.html?video=ERrDera4\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":5949,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/25e29638-fc4b-493b-a7db-aab2cc10536e/feedback.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/25e29638-fc4b-493b-a7db-aab2cc10536e/feedback.PNG?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"feedback.PNG\",\"name\":\"feedback.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"25e29638-fc4b-493b-a7db-aab2cc10536e\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":546,\"height\":71},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Feedback \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"is an important part of the Performance Review program at EPAM. It is a regular and ongoing process for obtaining feedback on the quality of your work from your colleagues and customers. Reviews are collected and processed by Resource Managers, after which employees are provided with consolidated feedback.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Feedback results are taken into account when developing your career development plan.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"iframe\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"//videoportal.epam.com/video/iframe.html?video=noPnEZJX\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":6771,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/686d161b-d44b-4aad-93d7-5ff1bd56d3c5/asmt.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/686d161b-d44b-4aad-93d7-5ff1bd56d3c5/asmt.PNG?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"asmt.PNG\",\"name\":\"asmt.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"686d161b-d44b-4aad-93d7-5ff1bd56d3c5\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":562,\"height\":71},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Promotion is an important event in the life of every employee. To help you reach your next seniority level, EPAM developed its unique Assessment process. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\rAssessment makes promotions objective, transparent and grounded. The international committee of Experts plays a key role in this process by sharing its opinion on Candidates’ readiness for promotion and giving feedback for further growth.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
